alert.note: Alert for Giles; Marshall (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 01 at 2:07PM CST until January 01 at 2:30PM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Marshall County in Middle Tennessee... Central Giles County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 230 PM CST. * At 206 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pulaski, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Pulaski and Cornersville. This includes Interstate 65 between mile markers 17 and 30. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for Middle Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for Middle Tennessee.
